official_title: Concerning the status of the Soviet Union in the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Treasury to instruct the U.S. executive directors of the International Monetary Fund and the International Bank for Reconstruction and Development to oppose observer status or full participation by the Soviet Union in such organizations.

titles.title: Concerning the status of the Soviet Union in the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank.
